name: Kitty Cat Dentist
description:
Want to be a Dentist? Cats need a Dentist too! Be the Dentist for these little furry kitties. Choose from 7 different cat patients and make their teeth as good as new. Once their teeth are all nice and fixed you can make their teeth all sorts of fun colors and even place stickers on them!

This is a great game for kids and adults of all ages!
